fullText: This gorgeous chamber musical about cultural connection and the healing power of music is a work of understated beauty that grows more affecting with each scene.

bwwExcerpt: One of the small miracles of The Band's Visit is that this wistful new musical - in which themes of waiting, yearning and inertia play a significant part - weaves such seduction out of ephemeral encounters unfolding over a single uneventful night. As soothing as a cool breeze across desert sands, this gorgeous, minor-key show won a deserved cluster of awards in its premiere late last year at the Atlantic Theater Company.
